Pre-Game Insights: England's red-ball team return to action against Pakistan this week with a major point to prove ahead of a huge summer.
Captain Jos Buttler led his team to glory at the first time of asking in the T20 World Cup 2022 with a confident victory over this series's visitors.

However, things haven't gone to plan since then. England were battered, bruised and, ultimately, humiliated in India during the Cricket World Cup 2023. They lost six out of nine games during their miserable, failed title defence.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The England v Pakistan 1st T20 match takes place at 6:30pm on Wednesday 22nd May 2024.
You can watch the series live on Sky Sports Cricket and Main Event.
